com.ephesoft.gxt.systemconfig.client.regexbuilder

Class RegexEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.gxt.systemconfig.client.regexbuilder.RegexEngine

  • public final class RegexEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates the regex pattern based on the input provided. This class is having the methods which contains the logic for the generation of the Regex Pattern.

    This class also contains some utility methods.

    Version:
    1.0 $LastChangedDate:$
    $LastChangedRevision:$
    Author:
    Ephesoft created on 19-Dec-2014
    See Also:
    RegexBuilderDetailsDTO

      Generates the regex pattern based on the input provided and returns the regex pattern generated.

      Returns false if str2 is greater than str1 otherwise returns true.

      • isValidValueInRange

        public static boolean isValidValueInRange(java.lang.String textValue,
                          java.lang.String rangeRegex)
        Matches the text with the regex range and if it doesn't matches then it returns false otherwise returns true.
        Parameters:
        textValue - String The text which is to validated.
        rangeRegex - String The regex range. for example a-z,0-9 etc.
        Returns:
        false if the text value doesn't matches with in the regex range otherwise returns false.
